text: Horsfieldia pandurifolia is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to China. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Sun, W. 1998. Horsfieldia pandurifolia. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Flora of China pandurifolia Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Horsfieldia pandurifolia
